title: Mathematics for Beginners
subject: Mathematics
description: An engaging course covering basic arithmetic, algebra, and geometry, designed to strengthen foundational math skills through interactive lessons and practice problems.

classes.class_description: An interactive class designed to build strong arithmetic and algebra foundations. Learn through practice problems, quizzes, and fun math games.
Explore the world of shapes, angles, and measurements in this easy-to-follow course. Ideal for beginners looking to develop spatial reasoning.

title: Introduction to Computer Science
subject: Computer Science
description: Learn the basics of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and programming logic. Perfect for students new to coding and computational thinking.

classes.class_description: Start your programming journey by learning basic algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving skills. No prior experience required.
A hands-on Python programming course for beginners, where you’ll learn coding basics, logic, and how to build small applications.

title: Creative Writing and Storytelling
subject: Literature
description: Discover the art of storytelling and creative writing. This course nurtures imagination and guides students in crafting compelling stories, poems, and essays.

classes.class_description: This course nurtures imagination and writing skills. Students will explore fiction, poetry, and narrative structure to bring their creative ideas to life.
Dive into the art of storytelling, where students will craft compelling stories, learn character development, and master narrative techniques.

title: Fundamentals of Physics
subject: Physics
description: Dive into the exciting world of physics! Explore motion, energy, force, and simple machines through experiments, visual aids, and real-life applications.

classes.class_description: Dive into the exciting world of physics! Explore motion, energy, force, and simple machines through experiments, visual aids, and real-life applications.

title: Introduction to Biology: Life and Living Things
subject: Biology
description: Explore the wonders of biology, from cells and DNA to ecosystems and human anatomy. Ideal for students who want to understand life on Earth.

classes.class_description: Explore the wonders of biology, from cells and DNA to ecosystems and human anatomy. Ideal for students who want to understand life on Earth.

title: Art and Design: Drawing and Painting Basics
subject: Art & Design
description: A hands-on course where students learn drawing, painting, color theory, and design fundamentals to express their creativity visually.

classes.class_description: A hands-on course where students learn drawing, painting, color theory, and design fundamentals to express their creativity visually.

title: World History: Ancient Civilizations to Modern Times
subject: History
description: Take a journey through time exploring key historical events, civilizations, and influential figures that shaped our world from ancient times to today.

classes.class_description: Take a journey through time exploring key historical events, civilizations, and influential figures from ancient civilizations to the medieval period.
Explore the modern era, focusing on the major historical events, revolutions, and figures that shaped the contemporary world.

title: Introduction to Environmental Science
subject: Environmental Science
description: Learn about the environment, ecosystems, conservation, and climate change. This course encourages awareness and responsibility for our planet.

classes.class_description: Learn about the environment, ecosystems, conservation, and climate change. This course encourages awareness and responsibility for our planet.

title: Personal Finance and Money Management for Teens
subject: Finance
description: Equip students with essential financial literacy skills, including budgeting, saving, investing, and understanding credit in an engaging and practical way.

classes.class_description: Equip students with essential financial literacy skills, including budgeting, saving, investing, and understanding credit in an engaging and practical way.

title: Chemistry Essentials: Atoms to Reactions
subject: Chemistry
description: Explore the building blocks of matter, chemical reactions, and the periodic table. Perfect for students curious about how substances interact and change.

classes.class_description: Explore the building blocks of matter, chemical reactions, and the periodic table. Perfect for students curious about how substances interact and change.

title: Introduction to Economics: Understanding Markets and Money
subject: Economics
description: Learn the basics of economics, including supply and demand, markets, and personal finance. A great start for understanding how economies function.

classes.class_description: Learn the basics of economics, including supply and demand, markets, and personal finance. A great start for understanding how economies function.

title: Music Theory and Composition Basics
subject: Music
description: An inspiring course introducing music theory, notation, rhythm, and composition. Great for budding musicians and creative minds.

classes.class_description: An inspiring course introducing music theory, notation, rhythm, and composition. Great for budding musicians and creative minds.

title: Geography: Exploring Our World
subject: Geography
description: Travel the world through this course on physical and human geography, exploring continents, cultures, climates, and global connections.

classes.class_description: Travel the world through this course on physical and human geography, exploring continents, cultures, climates, and global connections.

title: Public Speaking and Communication Skills
subject: Communication
description: Develop confidence and clarity in speaking through this course on public speaking, presentations, and effective communication strategies.

classes.class_description: Develop confidence and clarity in speaking through this course on public speaking, presentations, and effective communication strategies.

title: Introduction to Psychology: Understanding Human Behavior
subject: Psychology
description: Dive into the study of the mind and behavior, exploring topics like emotions, cognition, development, and personality in everyday life.

classes.class_description: Dive into the study of the mind and behavior, exploring topics like emotions, cognition, development, and personality in everyday life.

title: Business Basics: Entrepreneurship and Innovation
subject: Business
description: Learn how businesses work, from idea generation to marketing and management. Perfect for future entrepreneurs and innovators.

classes.class_description: Learn how businesses work, from idea generation to marketing and management. Perfect for future entrepreneurs and innovators.

title: Introduction to Political Science: Government and Society
subject: Political Science
description: Understand political systems, ideologies, and global governance. Ideal for students interested in how societies are organized and governed.

classes.class_description: Understand political systems, ideologies, and global governance. Ideal for students interested in how societies are organized and governed.

title: Health and Wellness: Nutrition and Fitness
subject: Health
description: A practical guide to healthy living, covering nutrition, exercise, mental health, and wellness habits for a balanced lifestyle.

classes.class_description: A practical guide to healthy living, covering nutrition, exercise, mental health, and wellness habits for a balanced lifestyle.

title: Engineering and Design Thinking
subject: Engineering
description: Explore the world of engineering and innovation through design challenges, problem-solving, and creative thinking activities.

classes.class_description: Explore the world of engineering and innovation through design challenges, problem-solving, and creative thinking activities.
